title: "Andy Figure Replication"
author: "Andres De La Fuente"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
tweets <- read_excel("../Data/electionday_tweets_clean.xlsx")
```

```{r}
tweets$is_fake_news <- factor(tweets$is_fake_news, levels = c("TRUE", "FALSE"))
ggplot(tweets) +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Friends") +
  geom_density(aes(x=log(user_friends_count), fill=is_fake_news, color=is_fake_news), alpha=0.4) 

```
```{r}
ggplot(tweets) +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Followers") +
  geom_density(aes(x=log(user_followers_count), fill=is_fake_news, color=is_fake_news), alpha=0.4) 

```
```{r}
ggplot(tweets) +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Friends to Followers Ratio") +
  geom_density(aes(x=(log(user_friends_count)/log(user_followers_count)), fill=is_fake_news, color=is_fake_news), alpha=0.4) 

```
